import.help_content:
Import an entire theme or discipline

To import a theme, you must provide a .zip file that meets the following requirements:

  • The name of the discipline must be unique
  • All the disciplines must be in the origin of the .zip
  • Each discipline folder must contain a single .json file of the discipline to be created
  • Each discipline folder must contain three module folders imported in Aâ€“Z order
  • Each module folder must contain several question folders
  • Each question folder must contain a single .json file corresponding to the question to be created
  • NEW: a module or a chapter can contain a remove:true field to delete it
  • NEW: a module or a chapter can change places if it has a swap:INDEX filed where INDEX is the number of the position to take (beginning with 0)

Import a user zip

To import a group of users, you must provIDe a .zip respecting the following rules:

  • The login of each user must be unique
  • All users must be at the origin of the .zip

Download an example .zip

achievements.confirm: Please enter "{{word}}" to confirm deletion of your progression

buildReport.title: Pernod Report Generation
buildReport.help_content: Upload the Zip with your excels and specify the mail where you want to receive the result
buildReport.upload_in_progress:
Your file is being uploaded. Processing might take few minutes.
You'll receive result by mail
buildReport.file_received:
File has been received by the server and is currently being handled without error.
You should receive an email with the result in a few minutes.
